variables.name: Version

Nextcloud version, latest will install the latest version.

Ex: "24.0.6"

variables.name: Enable OCC
variables.description:
Only use it to do Maintenance.
Run the command and then disable it.
Occ é Nextcloud command line interface. You can perform many operations. = common server with occ, how to install and update Nextcloud, manage users, encryption, passwords, LDAP configuration and much more.

variables.name: OCC Command
variables.description: Write here the command that will be executed by occ on startup. Ex: list (will list all existing commands)
